ArticleTitle.sentence: Activation of nuclear factor-kappaB by lipopolysaccharide in mononuclear leukocytes is prevented by inhibitors of cytosolic phospholipase A2.

AbstractText.sentence: We have shown previously that trifluoromethylketone inhibitors of cytosolic phospholipase A2 suppressed interleukin-1beta protein and steady-state mRNA levels in human lipopolysaccharide-stimulated peripheral blood mononuclear leukocytes.

AbstractText.sentence: In this study, the subcellular mechanisms were analyzed by which trifluoromethylketones interfere with gene expression.
